maqras.text: Nomi Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙaatro ʙa poki jod kun
[Hamon] ki [insonro] ofarid va hamohang va mutaodil soxt
Va [hamon] kase, ki andozagiri kard va [ʙa soistagi ofarid] va sipas hidojat namud
Va [on] kase, ki carogohro [ʙaroi taƣzijai condoron] rujonid
Sipas onro xusku sijoh gardonid
Mo ʙa zudi [Qur'onro] ʙar tu mexonem; pas, tu hargiz [onro] faromus naxohi kard
Magar on ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad; hamono U oskoru nihonro medonad
Va ʙaroi tu osontarin [roh]-ro faroham megardonem
Pas, agar pandi mufid ʙosad, [mardumro ʙo ojoti Qur'on] pand deh
Ba zudi, kase, ki [az Alloh taolo] metarsad, pand mepazirad
Va ʙadʙaxttarin [-i mardum] az on duri meguzinad
[Hamon] Kase, ki dar otasi ʙuzurg [-i cahannam] darxohad omad
Va dar on [otas] na memirad va na zinda memonad
Jaqinan, kase, ki xudro [az kufru gunoh] pok kunad, rastagor xohad sud
Va [niz kase, ki] nomi Parvardigorasro jod kunad va namoz ʙiguzorad
Vale sumo [mardum] zindagii dunjoro [ʙar oxirat] tarceh medihed
Dar hole ki oxirat ʙehtar va pojandatar ast
Ba rosti, in [pandho] dar kitoʙhoi osmonii pesin [niz] ʙud
Kitoʙhoi Iʙrohim va Muso
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo xaʙari qijomati havlnoki farogir ʙa tu rasidaast
Dar on ruz cehrahoe xoru zalil xohand ʙud
[Dar dunjo] Pajvasta talos karda [va] xasta suda [va cun dar rohi haq naʙuda, naticae nadidaand]
Dar otasi suzon darmeojand
Az casmai ʙisjor garm ʙa onho nusonda mesavand
Ƣizoe cuz xori xusku talx nadorand
Ki na [ononro] farʙeh kunad va na gurusnagiro daf' menamojad
Dar on ruz cehrahoe sodoʙu toza hastand
Va az sa'j [-ju talos]-i xud xusnudand
Dar ʙihisti ʙarin hastand
Dar on co hec suxani ʙehudae namesunavand
Dar on casma [-hoi oʙ] ravon ʙosad
Dar on taxthoi [zeʙoi] ʙaland [poja] ast
Va comhoe [ki dar kanori casmaho] nihoda suda
Va ʙolisthoi [munazzam] cidasuda
Va [niz] farshoi garonʙaho gusturda sudaast
Ojo [kofiron] ʙa sutur namenigarand, ki ci guna ofarida sudaast
Va ʙa osmon [namenigarand], ki ci guna ʙarafrosta sudaast
Va ʙa kuhho [namenigarand], ki ci guna [muhkam ʙar zamin] nasʙ sudaast
Va ʙa zamin [namenigarand], ki ci guna gusturda sudaast
Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] pand ʙideh, ki tu tanho panddihandai
Tu ʙar onon musallat [-u cira] nesti [ki ʙar imon vodorason kuni]
Ammo kase, ki ruj ʙigardonad va kofir savad
Sipas Alloh taolo uro ʙo ʙuzurgtarin azoʙ mucozot mekunad
Hamono ʙozgasti onho ʙa suji Most
Sipas ʙe gumon, hisoʙason [niz] ʙo Most
Savgand ʙa suʙh
Va ʙa saʙhoi dahgona [-i oƣozi zulhicca]
Va ʙa zavc va fard [-i asjo]
Va savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki [harakat mekunad va] meravad
Ojo dar in [cizho] savgande ʙaroi sohiʙxirad nest [ki uro qone' namojad]
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi, ki Parvardigorat ʙo [qavmi] Od ci kard
[Hamon qaʙilai] Iram, ki doroi [koxhoi ʙo] sutunhoi ʙaland ʙudand
Ki hammonandi on dar sahrho ofarida nasuda ʙud
Va [niz qavmi] Samud, onhoe, ki saxrahoi saxtro az [kanori] vodi metarosidand [va ʙaroi xud xona mesoxtand]
Va Fir'avn sohiʙi sipohi [ʙuzurg va qudratmand]
[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar sahrho tuƣjon [va sarkasi] kardand
Va dar onho fasodi ʙisjor ʙa ʙor ovardand
On goh Parvardigorat tozijonai azoʙro ʙar onon furud ovard
Jaqinan Parvardigori tu dar kamingoh ast
Va ammo inson hangome ki Parvardigoras uro ʙiozmojad va giromi dorad va ʙa u ne'mat ʙaxsad, [maƣrur megardad va] megujad: «Parvardigoram maro giromi dostaast»
Va ammo hangome ki uro ʙiozmojad va ruziasro ʙar u tang girad, [dilsard suda] megujad: «Parvardigoram maro xor kardaast»
Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; ʙalki sumo jatimro giromi namedored
Va jakdigarro ʙar it'omi mustamandon tarƣiʙ namekuned
Va merosro harisona mexured [va haqqi zaifonro namedihed]
Va molu sarvat [-i dunjo]-ro ʙisjor dust medored
Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; hangome ki zamin saxt darham kuʙida savad [va hamvor gardad]
Va Parvardigorat [ʙaroi dodrasi] ʙijojad va [niz] faristagon saf dar saf [ʙiistand]
Va dar on ruz cahannam ovarda savad, dar on ruz insoni [kofir] pand megirad [va tavʙa mekunad]; va [ammo] in pand giriftan ci sude ʙarojas dorad
Vaj megujad: «Ej kos, [dar dunjo] ʙaroi [in] zindagiam [cize az] pes firistoda ʙudam
Pas, dar on ruz hec kas hammonandi azoʙi U [Alloh taolo] azoʙ namekunad
Va hec kas hamcun ʙand kasidani U [Alloh taolo] kasero ʙa ʙand namekasad
[Ammo ʙa mu'min nido mesavad] «Ej ruhi oromjofta
Ba suji Parvardigorat ʙozgard, dar hole ki tu [az podosi Alloh taolo] xusnudi va U az [a'moli] tu xusnud ast
Pas, dar zumrai ʙandagoni [xossi] Man daro
Va ʙa ʙihisti Man vorid sav»
